props.description: Which prop declaration method to use

children.description: Whether the component is meant to have children (FC) or not (VFC)

flat.description: Whether to create a new, dedicated dir for the component (false) or not (true)

stylingModule.description: Relevant for `css` or `scss` styling. If true, generates a scoped `module` stylesheet

overwrite.description: Whether to overwrite existing files, if any are found

postCommand.description: A command to run after a component was successfully generated

baseDir.description: Path to a base directory which components should be genenrated in or relative to

destination.description: The path in which the component folder/files should be generated, relative to baseDir

allowOutsideBase.description: If true, allows components to be generated outside the resolved baseDir

exportType.description: Whether to use a named export or a default export for the component

declaration.description: Whether to declare the component as a const with an arrow function or a function declaration

memo.description: Whether to generate a memo() component. Overrides the declaration option

separateIndex.description: Whether to use a dedicated index file (recommended)

reactNative.description: Whether to generate React Native components

debug.description: Whether to log additional debug information
